entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Edmonton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Blatchford 06:00 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
Temperature: 12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 46 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 28. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 late this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
